channel.title: 718 buy chaotics command for regular players

item.title: 718 buy chaotics command for regular players
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

[quote=“slayer 5, post:1, topic:542383”]this is the command i tryed to use to allow regular players to buy chaotics with fist of guthix tokens but it only works for admin plus someone please help

		}
		if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("crapier")) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(12852, 20000);
			player.getInventory().addItem(18349, 1);
			return true;

if someone could please help me i would greatly appricate it and if you can make it so if they dont have enough tokens they cant buy thank you[/quote]

		if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("crapier")) {
				if (player.getInventory().hasitem(12852) < 20000) {
					  player.getPackets()
					  .sendGameMessage(
							  "You need 20,000 FOG Tokens to buy this!",
							  true);
							return;
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(12852, 20000);
			player.getInventory().addItem(18349, 1);
			return true;

Basic command… The one above wont work i dont think, because hasitem isnt a real thing i dont think… but that is how it should be written out.

Read full topic
